website_summaries.verdict: A sweet option from a top brand that's designed for a novice bicyclist who needs a small, durable model to learn the basics of riding.
pros: Boasts a pretty design with front basket
Great for girls learning to ride, with 16-inch tires, an adjustable seat, hand and pedal brakes, and training wheels
cons: Lacks a kickstand, which would come in handy when training wheels are no longer needed
Can be a bit difficult to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Girls love this bike.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike after a lot of research for my two grand daughters (4 and 6) this bike fits both their sizes. I just adjust the seat up and down to fit them. Assembly is easy, handle bars one nut, pedals screw right on, front wheel two nuts, adjusting the hand brake (because it's cheap) was a little time consuming, but on a kids bike I like them to use the coaster brake anyhow. Training wheels and seat then its done. Both of the girls love it and can ride it with the training wheels very easily. I just might have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ROYAL B WILLIFORD

customer_reviews.title: They don’t make em how they used to
customer_reviews.text: They don’t make em how they used to...they went el cheapo on this model. Cost was moderate to low end, so I wasn’t expecting bells and whistles, but woulda been nice for the trainer wheels to touch the ground and placed at an appropriate angle. This bike is also considerably more difficult to pedal from a standstill...not sure if it is drag or resistance, but I reason that it builds strength for longer rides. My girl did like the decals and basket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not the quaility I expected from a Schwinn bike.
customer_reviews.text: Not the Schwinn quality I expected. My Granddaughter loved this bike, but after just a few rides on it, one of the training wheels fell off because the screws were stripped off and the washers specific to these training wheels fell off and got lost. $50.00 at a bike shop for new training wheels. The sevond ride after that was fixed, one of the bike petals kept falling off and could not be tightened. Also stripped or faulty crank and screws. Oh , yeah, the decals on the handles came off right away, so if you’re buying it because of the decoration, forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: She's got a smile on her face!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter LOVES this. She rides it often. My basket came out of the box all warped out like it got hot and settled weird but she doesn't mind. I managed to put it together without instructions (which I didn't find until I put the seat on). Breaks and training wheels are all easy to adjust but use an adjustable wrench to ensure tight fits.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Sisco

customer_reviews.title: " I got a great one that I am thrilled with
customer_reviews.text: After seeing mixed reviews on this bicycle arriving with complaints of a warped wheel, or rubbing items unable to fix needed returning, etc. I still took a chance and purchased this for Grammy's house for all grandkids to ride. "Santa brought Grammy a bike this year!" I got a great one that I am thrilled with! But what was I thinking? With 4 children, I've never purchased a bike with white wheels before as I just loved the look for granddaughters. DUH! What was I thinking? The cute little white wheels don't stay white after one riding.....Personally I'll now stick to those black tires...but wouldn't trade it because it is awfully cute....dirty looking but still cute!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute bike, arrived with some damage, incomplete instructions
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike for our daughter for Easter. It is adorable and she loves it, but we had some trouble with assembly because the instructions were incomplete (front fender was not attached yet, so we had to disassemble the front caliper break to install it, and then put the break back together). The fenders were not mentioned or pictured anywhere in the manual. Also, the seat arrived with a small puncture to the front part. I registered the bike this am and requested a replacement seat, so I am hopeful we can get a new one for her. If they get back to us, I will probably edit and improve the review.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer of a Little Bike
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was perfect, loved the colors, beautiful Schwinn bike for my daughter, while being tough and sturdy and no white tires to show dirt! One small flaw ended up being a huge problem tho, and it had to be sent back a mere month after we got it! We were lucky the pedal crank broke before our return window closed! My daughter was just riding on the sidewalk when the chain suddenly went loose and was not fixable by my dad who used to work in a bike shop. Fair warning, this seems to be a common thing with these little girls Schwinn bikes from other reviews I have seen. So sad we really loved this little bike!
customer_reviews.author: Dcthmpsn

customer_reviews.title: I can’t tell if the one we got is old or counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this are a lot more faded than what it’s supposed to be. I don’t know if it’s a counterfeit or if it’s just old and hasn’t sold and thus has faded with time. Not really impressed because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Cameren Kotwicki

customer_reviews.title: Could not assemble due to faulty piece
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike in concept, but the quality control on the pieces I received was quite bad. I got a couple steps into the instructions - which are overly complicated - and one of the bolts had bad threads and thus could not be attached. So, no bike for my daughter’s birthday. Thanks, Schwinn - think I’ll be returning it and purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ride!
customer_reviews.text: This bike was perfect for our 4 year old (soon to be 5) grand daughter. Shiny, bright colors (all her favs). Took my husband about 1.5 hours to assemble. Very sturdy (held my 125 lbs frame). Brake pads lined up perfectly. The back brakes are activated by reversing the peddles (a must for first time riders), but it also has a hand brake for the front tires which enable her to learn hand brakes. The training wheels are adjustable so you can shorten them as the child gets better at balancing on 2 wheels. Overall, great bike for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MsShelB

customer_reviews.title: Good little girls bike
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little girls bike. I have a big 5 year old, she’s 90th percentile and this bike was a great fit for her and she will easily be able to continue using it for a couple years. She loves the basket and colors, it was quick to assemble. My only complaint is the steering seems to be on the tight side so she has to exert some effort to turn easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the bike. Hasn't been ridden much, but the training wheels did come loose quickly... I've lock tighted other training wheels in the past to keep this from happening... And they may have needed to be installed tighter. So I'll try that next. Other than that we really liked this bike. Beautiful colors... Looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Scombs

customer_reviews.title: Instructions included not very helpful in putting the bike together.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions included were terrible. I was able to figure most of the steps out by looking at the picture of the completed bike on the box. The brakes, however, did not work correctly and there were zero instructions as to what we needed to do. Now I have to go pay a bike shop to fix the brakes on a brand new bike.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Action is required by the Seller
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle was received without the front basket. My granddaughter was very specific about what she wanted. She asked for a pink bicycle, with training wheels, and a basket and that is what we ordered. Please send me the exact basket ASAP, that was included with my purchase. I've saved the box and packaging material but I'd rather not have to disassemble it and return the bike for credit. Thank you, Bill McGuinniss
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McGuinniss

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Very well made. The training wheels are easily adjustable. My 5 year old really likes riding it. Now she wants the training wheels off to start learning how to ride it without them. The seat was easy to lower a little to help her stand and balance while she learns.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4.5 YO petite daughter for Christmas, has only ridden once (hints why no 5 stars) and it's perfect! Despite the reviews below, husband had this built in about 30-40min tops and he isn't an engineer. Great purchase, packaged perfectly and bought on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it works great since I added a kick stand. Please make sure to tighten bills really well as I was a little easy on the bolts and had some loosen up. Overall very happy and my daughter rides it at least twice a week on average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike colors & style, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. It was a lot to assemble. Training wheels won’t fit properly so I have to take it to a bike shop to figure out the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Trina's review

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bike, a little bigger then I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Great little bike. We got the for our 4 year old. The bike is a little big for her, I don't think she would be big enough if I took the training wheels off, but she is not ready for that anyway, so it seems to be working pretty good. It went together pretty quick and seems to be holding up well. The little flowers on the hand grips have got pretty dirty pretty quick, but they are white, so I guess that is expected. It does NOT include a kick stand for when you take the training wheels off, it does not say it does, but I figured I would point it out.
customer_reviews.author: PMO

customer_reviews.title: The back wheel is bent and I can't find any ...
customer_reviews.text: The back wheel is bent and I can't find any links for contacting the manufacturer. Someone from Schwinn please contact me and I'll update this review Update: I emailed Schwin and they responded immediatly and sent a new back wheel
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES  it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter 4 years old. She loves it. The only thing is it was missing a part. It was the Schwinn crossbar pad that goes on the handle bars by the basket. To much of a hassle for me to return it just for that. Very easy to assemble. Went & got her a helmet that matches the bike. Her very first bike
customer_reviews.author: MIMI LANIER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we ordered, easy assembly, Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It was just the bike that we wanted. No need to go to countless stores to find it. It was pretty easy to assemble using just an adjustable wrench and the items supplied. I found that putting some 3 in 1 oil in the hub and on othe moving parts made it move easier. Our grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Meixler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her new bike. We purchased the 16inch which was definitely too big for our petite 4 yr old. She can ride and dismount but not touch the ground with her feet. At least she'll have it for a while! Great sturdy bike, super easy to assemble. So beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: nelson rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike! It made her 4th birthday in quarantine amazing! She loved being able to decorate her bike too! It’s safe and sturdy. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Tara RL

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. I had to ask the neighbor to put it together because I just couldn’t make sense of the directions. The training wheels keep coming loose so make sure to check them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Menge

customer_reviews.title: a good quality kids bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a good quality kids bicycle. My 6-year old daughter loves it. It's well constructed, and worth its price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dom F

customer_reviews.title: Great Learner Bike
customer_reviews.text: Best quality for the money. 5 year old loves it. Easy 20mins to assemble. Should last for years. The mud flaps are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 3 months but kids love them
customer_reviews.text: These look great, but they are already falling apart after 3 months. We have not been able to get any help with the problems. skip these and go to your local bike shop or REI and buy real bikes
customer_reviews.author: John Finley

customer_reviews.title: Great!! My daughter is 3yrs - this bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Great!! My daughter is 3yrs - this bike was a perfect choice as a first one. She rides it daily and has no discomfort. Assembling this bike was a breeze so were adjustments. Cant go wrong - and I was happy to be away from girls must love pink stereotype. Purple with green and a little pink is FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.⏳

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: The bike came as expected, but I was very disappointed when my daughter saw it sitting on the front porch in the stock box with the picture of the bike on it. This was supposed to be her big Christmas gift and her surprise was ruined. In the future, box the item so it isnt obvious what is inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pedals constantly fall off/come unscrewed. Need some sort of way to keep them on. Otherwise it’s great. It’s pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Callie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: The beautiful colors. The option to assemble training wheels or not. A great gift overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted a purple bike with a basket, so this was great as it doesn't have random licensed characters on it. The back wheel guard / fender still seems to be a little bit strangely assembled but overall it works well and makes her happy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice but has faults
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy—we only took it out once so far. However the pedals keep falling off. Also the basket came so warped that we cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter’s 5th birthday. The colors are very pretty and she loves riding it. I also bought the purple floral bike bell which coordiantes perfectly. I gave 4 stars because it does not come with any reflectors on the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B D

customer_reviews.title: Best bike for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my 5 year old daughter and she loves it! The only downside was that the one pedal wasn’t threaded to screw on to the crank, but I contacted Amazon and they immediately sent me a whole new bike and shipping label. I received the bike on a Sunday as promised and couldn’t have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: Chris The Kid

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bike, it was super easy to assemble, colors are great. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Cute bike but the wheels fall off every five minutes and the training wheels are not evenly distributed on the ground, the bike rocks back and forth slightly. For the price I didn’t expect these issues. However, it is extremely cute and girly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than it looks. Measure first!!
customer_reviews.text: Really thought I was getting a bit larger bike, as my granddaughter is quite tall for her age. But, she loves it & that’s what counts!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Estes

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest bike, and my almost 5 yo loves it. Easy for her to ride now, and definitely some room to grow into. The basket is a nice touch, too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Robles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bike has met all expectations. Assembly was simple, color is beautiful , and the training wheels are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Nanner

customer_reviews.title: Our granddaughter loves her bike!
customer_reviews.text: We got a video on Christmas Day and she was gleefully riding her cute bike. It’s perfect. She’s 5.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great look and super easy installation
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her Xmas present. The bike is exceptionally sturdy with the exception of the basket. It felt apart upon installation; I’m glad my daughter didn’t miss it but it would have been useful if it had worked. Other than that, we’re very happy with the bike’s performance and look.
customer_reviews.author: Wapoboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike!!! Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Perfect for first time rider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is easier to ride then other for kids that have a difficult time pedaling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves her bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new bike. It was easy to assemble and it looks great. The colors are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tcook

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Hand Brakes work after simple adjustment. Nice quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: karston Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Picture on the box if ordering for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Neat bike but if ordering and getting sent to your house there is an image of the bike on the box. Santa and Christmas lovers beware
customer_reviews.author: lauras

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bike. It was a gift for my grand daughter. We bought the bike early. When my son assembled the bike yesterday, the foam pad for the handle bar was missing. How can I get the missing parts? Your help would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cute bike, very sturdy and doesn't feel cheap. Good for paved roads, but also for dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE. Great quality. Santa Clause dropped this bicycle off for my three year old daughter and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great communication and fast quality work
customer_reviews.text: Barry put together my daughter’s bike lightning fast! I really appreciate it because it was a Birthday gift and she was in the house and didn’t even notice he was there. He texted me with an expected time, not a time frame. Great communication and fast quality work! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: L. Barberan

customer_reviews.title: Defective brakes.
customer_reviews.text: Brakes were defective. Incredibly unsafe. Had to take to a dealer to repair (a brand new bike!). Really disappointed that a child's bike would have defective brakes. Won't be buying another Schwinn in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: bpaul

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful Bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is adorable! My daughter loves her little bike!
customer_reviews.author: mossunlimited

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The same as the picture.the girl is very happy
customer_reviews.author: CClife

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's really irritating when your granddaughter opens up her package and wants to ride her bike and there are missing parts. Won't/don't buy any schwinn products again. Very upset seven year-old to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This is an ok bike. Constant tightening and issues ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok bike. Constant tightening and issues with the mud flaps moving and scraping tires.
customer_reviews.author: APP

customer_reviews.title: but some good zip ties instead
customer_reviews.text: straps to hold basket on are junk, but some good zip ties instead. bike though is good
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday. she loves it. Firm bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to see that all the parts that came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see that all the parts that came with it did come. I had read some reviews that some didn't receive all
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bike. It was easy to assemble, and has held up to use very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality bicycle, not a toy
customer_reviews.text: Well built, solid. Better design & engineering than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: amxpress

customer_reviews.title: Five STAR bike!
customer_reviews.text: We got this bike for our 4 yr old - we couldn’t ask for a more perfect bike & she LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mixson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible bike. My daughter has literally just sat on this bike and already it has a flat tire and a broken rubber hand grip. Do not but this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my 4 year old. Easy to assemble and really sturdy. The basket is a nice touch, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Soto

customer_reviews.title: as for the product itself it’s pretty and looks like it runs well (still haven’t been ...
customer_reviews.text: Tutorial, instructions, and assemble is kind of challenging, as for the product itself it’s pretty and looks like it runs well (still haven’t been able to use as i will be taking it to the shop for further building)
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bike for the money. Great transitional bike for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: GemmaBean

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pedals keep falling off no matter how much we tighten it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Suzanne Pope

customer_reviews.title: Greta Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bicycle and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Collins

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: But why Pink $40 more the the other colors. Ripped
customer_reviews.author: up3400

customer_reviews.title: Tires don't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to teach my granddaughter to ride. I've always thought of Schwinn as a quality product. Both tires need to be aired up every two - three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: allan1952

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This bike was perfect for my daughter's 4th birthday! Pretty design and well made. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bike was a great birthday gift for our granddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: carol a christophel

customer_reviews.title: the training wheels won't stay securely in place, one always needs "a kick back to place".
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it, the look and the size of it is perfect for an almost six year old. I would get again :)
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Bike seems to be of decent quality, but caliper ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike seems to be of decent quality, but caliper brakes did not work well at all and the provided manual is for a different bike entirely.
customer_reviews.author: papasmurf

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bike - had it a couple months, and it’s holding up just great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice bike! My 6 year old granddaughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: purrl

customer_reviews.title: Not 2 happy
customer_reviews.text: One of the front brake pads was missing and the box was badly damaged
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rommeney

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bike and our daughter loved it. Was also really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DNOE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues with this bike after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner bike
customer_reviews.text: Little girl loves the bike. Hand brake and pedal brake is great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Julie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Seeking refund.
customer_reviews.text: This item was broken after a few rides. The break detached from the handle bar.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bicycle looks fine but the shipment came with a few missing screws..
customer_reviews.author: Martin Chung

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken brakes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars!!! Item arrived today and as we are putting it together. Noticed that the break is broken!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: The handle bars do not secure well to the axil of the bike
customer_reviews.author: JOHN CABRAL

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rotate pedals - crank bearings are broken - making noise while rotating. front wheel is bent.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Khoruzhiy

customer_reviews.title: Wasted time
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this bike for my five-year-old daughter, and after spending about an hour and a half putting together the next day took it to a bike shop because the rear wheel seemed to not be spinning freely. The bike shop owner checked it out and told me to return it because the rear wheel hub bearings are shot. He said he's been seeing a lot of Schwinn bikes with this same issue brand-new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and a quick assemble! My five year old is beyond excited about this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bike for kids
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughter for Christmas during a black Friday deal week special. It is a very solid bike and feels much sturdier than the little kid bikes my older kids had. The basket is was a little loose, but we added an extra zip tie and it was fine. I highly recommend this over the typical kids character bikes.
customer_reviews.author: G Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike! It is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike! It is sturdy. It was very easy to assemble. This is a nice quality bike that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together- general instructions that don't apply to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Easy to put together- general instructions that don't apply to this particular at bike so had to do a little guessing... but adorable
customer_reviews.author: michael chave

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and feminine
customer_reviews.text: This bike is so cute. Not gimmicky like all the character bikes. Once training wheel free she can actually ride it awhile unlike my older daughter's first bike that had princesses on it.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: This bike is garbage and I'm past the return date
customer_reviews.text: This bike is garbage and I'm past the return date. Its now 6 weeks old. It creaks like a 30 year old car (and it was put together properly, 100%)...I would have torqued stuff but of course the instructions suck and no torque ratings. My wife just got back from a bike ride with the kids and said the pedals are falling off. I didn't realize I had to loc-tite them.... What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wojtowycz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy for my 4 year old daughter to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Very sturdy and easy for my 4 year old daughter to pedal. The best feature for a parent is the extremely easy to adjust seat height (no tools required)! My daughter loves the basket too!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Bike is fine and what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bike is fine and what I thought. But I bought this for my daughters 4th birthday and the shipping was a day late even with the prime so i had to put the bike togeather at 7pm on her birthday not the surprise i wanted for her the bike is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A defect on tire
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the font tire is defected. We paid full price for this product, it would have been nice if it arrived in working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly wasn't bad and the overall look off he bike is so cute!! Way cuter in person than what you see online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly takes 25 min with proper tools
customer_reviews.text: Front breaks are a joke! After looking at dozens of YouTube videos trying to figure it out they are still broken. Bike is very heavy. Wheels front and rear are out of balance. Easy assembly takes 25 min with proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike. Terrible seller
customer_reviews.text: Brakes don’t work. Package came with instructions for a completely different bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5 years old just loving it everyday!perfect height for her
customer_reviews.author: Ning

product_meta.title: Schwinn Jasmine Girls Bike with Training Wheels, 16-Inch Wheels, Multiple Colors
feature_bullets: Schwinn Smart Start steel kids frame with rigid fork features kid-specific design for easier pedaling and handling
Rear coaster brake and front hand brake for intuitive stopping.
Tool-free adjustable seat post allows for leg extension, grows with the child as the saddle is raised.
Training wheels, basket, and fenders included.
16-inch wheel fits riders age 3 – 5, or 34 to 48 inches tall. Comes with limited lifetime for as long as you own the bike.
